resume_text:
NAME: Charlie Brown
EMAIL: charlie.brown@email.com
PHONE: (555) 456-7890

SUMMARY:
Highly motivated DevOps Engineer with 5+ years of experience in automating and streamlining software development and deployment processes. Proficient in various DevOps tools and technologies.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Git, Jenkins, Ansible

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Ltd. - DevOps Engineer (2019 - Present)
- Automated the deployment of applications to AWS using Terraform and Kubernetes.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git.

Software Company - System Administrator (2017 - 2019)
- Managed and maintained the company's servers and infrastructure.
- Implemented monitoring and alerting systems.

EDUCATION:
University of Washington - Bachelor's in Information Technology (2017)
